alert.note: Alert for Chase; Hayes; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 5:00PM CDT until May 11 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT/415 PM MDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN PERKINS...EASTERN CHASE AND WESTERN HAYES COUNTIES... At 459 PM CDT/359 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Enders, or 11 miles east of Imperial, moving northwest at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 347 MDT 60 mph wind was reported in Wauneta. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Imperial, Wauneta, Enders, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Chase, Hamlet, Center Dam Campground, Wanamaker State Wildfire Management Area, Area A Campground and Church Grove Campground. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 25 and 55. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
